submitter_donor_id.name: submitter_donor_id
submitter_donor_id.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

meta.notes: To prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the ARGO ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.

submitter_biospecimen_id.name: submitter_biospecimen_id
submitter_biospecimen_id.description: Unique identifier of the biospecimen, assigned by the data provider.

meta.notes: To prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the ARGO ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.

submitter_sample_id.name: submitter_sample_id
submitter_sample_id.description: Unique identifier of the molecular sample, assigned by the data provider

meta.notes: To prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the ARGO ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.

sample_type.description: Type of molecular sample used for analysis testing
sample_type.name: sample_type
